Package de.fherfurt.news.service.core.errors

Interface FunctionWithException<PARAM,RESULT,EXCEPTION extends Exception>

Type Parameters:
PARAM - Generic type of the parameter
RESULT - Generic type of the returned result
EXCEPTION - Generic exception type
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface FunctionWithException<PARAM,RESULT,EXCEPTION extends Exception>
This functional interface is used to wrap Function calls that throws checked exceptions.
